description:
Cooper Hurley Injury Lawyers is a Virginia personal injury law firm founded by attorneys John Cooper and Jim Hurley. Our main office is in Norfolk, and we have client meeting locations in downtown Hampton and five other cities on an appointment-only basis. We have helped people hurt in hundreds of personal injury accidents and the families of those making wrongful death claims. We understand how important it is to have a lawyer who is compassionate and easily accessible after suffering a loss or sustaining an injury.

Hampton is a bustling city which sees numerous accidents, whether on I-64, the congested Hampton Roads Bridge-Tunnel, Mercury Boulvard or on Settler's Landing Road.

Our attorneys have over 55 years of combined experience in personal injury law on the Virginia Peninsula. Founders John Cooper and Jim Hurley are peer-rated AV Preeminent* by Martindale-Hubbell and have been selected for inclusion in Virginia Super Lawyers - a distinction that few law firms can match. Partner Bill O'Mara has been selected as a Rising Star by Super Lawyers, as well as attorney John Baker

You can rely on Cooper Hurley Injury Lawyers to vigorously represent you in your personal injury or wrongful death claim. Our areas of practice include:

• Car and trucking accidents
• Motorcycle accidents
• Pedestrian and cycling accidents
• Catastrophic injury (e.g., brain injuries and spinal cord injuries)
• Slip and falls and premises liability cases
• Injuries at a business
• Industrial accidents
• Railroad passengers and railroad worker accidents
• Boating accidents.

Our attorneys have consistently been recognized for their excellence in personal injury law. Both our founders, John Cooper and Jim Hurley, are peer-rated AV Preeminent* by Martindale-Hubbell and have been selected for inclusion in Virginia Super Lawyers.. Attorney Griffin O'Hanlon joined the firm in the fall of 2015. Attorneys John Baker and Paige Thomas joined in 2018.

If you or someone you love has suffered because a driver, a medical professional, a trucking company, a railroad, manufacturer, business owner or other entity acted negligently, you can rely on Cooper Hurley Injury Lawyers for dependable legal representation.

Call 757-905-4240 to schedule your free initial consultation at our Hampton location or to request an off-site visit if you are unable to visit us. We operate on a no-win, no fee basis meaning we are only paid if we are successful in recovering money in your case.

*AV Preeminent and BV Distinguished are certification marks of Reed Elsevier Properties Inc., used in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the confidential opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell ratings fall into two categories: legal ability and general ethical standards.
